programme.title: The Munchiez Ep 10
programme.desc: Join Jilla Johnson & Ricky Ellis as they ride along the ultimate cross-town foodie road trip, hitting up all the local hotspots across the U.S.! From American, vegan, and everything in between, you're sure to find everything you love and mo

programme.title: The Munchiez Ep 11
programme.desc: Join Jilla Johnson & Ricky Ellis as they ride along the ultimate cross-town foodie road trip, hitting up all the local hotspots across the U.S.! From American, vegan, and everything in between, you're sure to find everything you love and mo

programme.title: GET A JOB
programme.desc: Unemployed and living with the mother-in-law from hell, a young comedian and his childhood friend are sucked into the ride of their lives when they decide there is no time like the present to pursue their dreams of opening a comedy club.

programme.title: ROOT UP
programme.desc: Joselie lives in Guadeloupe, F.W.I. When she inherits 5 acres of land from her late father, the former seamstress becomes a farmer at age 48.

programme.title: FLY BY LIGHT
programme.desc: An intimate exploration of young people seeking to overcome the violence in their lives and create a new path for their future by connecting to a world outside their neighborhood.

programme.title: EMERGER
programme.desc: As the first woman to surf in her hometown of Dakar, Senegal, Khadjou Sambe emerged from a patriarchal system to become an icon for black women surfers all over the globe and pave the way for the next generation.

programme.title: CURIOSITIES OF THE QUIET BOY
programme.desc: A partially deaf 12-year-old undergoes a series of supernatural phenomena in the midst of mourning his mother.

programme.title: The Thorn of the Rose
programme.desc: Prosecuting Attorney David Lunga's success is overshadowed by the terrifying secrets of Rosa, a beautiful but mysterious woman with whom he falls in love. What mysteries does she hide? As the macabre facts unravel, David comes face to face with his own demons and is driven to prove his innocence, recover his reputation and, above all, clear his own conscience.

programme.title: WALK WITH ME
programme.desc: Walk With Me follows three women who use theater to inspire, stir and animate our democracy. While at work in prisons, schools and community centers, the film reveals that one person â€“ one artist â€“ can make a difference.

programme.title: 12 MONTHS
programme.desc: A documentary about a Los Angeles man who rents his three-bedroom home for $1 per month to help a family - he has never met - get on their feet.

programme.title: The Story of Lovers Rock
programme.desc: Lovers Rock, often dubbed â€�romantic reggaeâ€™ is a uniquely black British sound that developed in the late 70s and 80s to house parties, club and sound systems. Lovers Rock developed into a successful sound with national UK hits (Silly Games/Janet Kay) and was influential to British bands (Police, Culture Club, UB40)

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Abused and neglected, Kellee attempts to run away with her boyfriend James, only to be chased and cornered by her abusive stepfather. What follows is a series of events that leads to a violent confrontation with the abusive man who terrorizes her life.

programme.title: MONA
programme.desc: In June 1973, a week before the Portuguese Prime Minister, Dr Ribeiro, is due to arrive in London for a state visit, protests all over the city are growing due to Portugal's harsh foreign policy in its colony of Mozambique.

programme.title: CHANNELLING RICHARD PRYOR
programme.desc: Martini Harris embodies the spirit of Richard Pryor by looking upon the life he lead in his hysterical style from Pryor's outstanding Live performance 'RICHARD PRYOR LIVE ON SUNSET STRIP.

programme.title: WOLF
programme.desc: A family is shaken to the core when they discover their son has been molested. As they struggle to deal with the betrayal, their son heads towards a total mental collapse because of his love for his abuser, while his abuser attempts to exorcise his own past demons.

programme.title: FIRST DATE
programme.desc: A former, female boxing champion and her business partner coach are mentoring two teenage girls, best friends through their non-profit gym.

programme.title: AN UNCOMMON WOMAN
programme.desc: Mina is tired of her husband's infidelity and decides to take a drastic decision: She takes a second husband. Based on his conversations with women involved in polygamist relationships, filmmaker Abdoulaye Dao illustrates - to very funny effects - the daily life of two persons - in this case two men - who share a spouse.

programme.title: TITLE VII
programme.desc: The CEO of Sanger International, an IT consulting firm, is powerful and successful Hillary Kelsey. Kelsey is a black woman with no black employees and no one can figure out whyâ€”until Darryl Montgomery, her 9:30 am interview, enters the firm.

programme.title: Jazree's Court
programme.desc: Jazree's father was sent to jail for 7 years due to possession of an unloaded firearm. Jazree, who was close to her father, talks about the implication of growing up with him behind bars. Putting a person in jail doesn't just affect that individualâ€“it affects their entire family and community.

programme.title: FORWARD
programme.desc: Forward is a short film about finding love in an unexpected place and what happens when fantasies don't match up with reality. In this film a man finds a woman's purse on the train, tries to return it to her and falls for her in the process.

programme.title: The Jackie Robinson
programme.desc: After a successful baseball career in college and as a coach in the military, Jackie Robinson (playing himself) attracts the attention of Major League Baseball's Branch Rickey (Minor Watson). Rickey wants Robinson to play in the minor leagues, believing he can become the first player to break the color barrier and play in the majors. The only catch: He is forbidden from defending himself against racial bigotry. Supported by his wife (Ruby Dee), Robinson is steadfast in his determination to win.

programme.title: Wanted: Strong Woman
programme.desc: When an apprehensive woman channels her fears and insecurities into a new-found passion, it leads her to a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: Pahokee - The Send Off
programme.desc: Three award-winning short films that exquisitely capture the Pahokee community, a small black Florida town.

programme.title: DOO DOO'S REVENGE
programme.desc: Doo Doo’s Revenge compels us to ask the questions: at what age did I have learn to swallow my hurt? Would I do what Doo Doo did?
